Terms of Use and Privacy Policy


Thank you for installing our app.

This app is brought to you by P3 insight GmbH, Am Kraftversorgungsturm 3, 52070 Aachen (P3). Any use of the app is only allowed under these conditions.

With accepting these terms you agree to the different feature sets as described below. It is at your discretion to choose which version you’d like to run.

“Light”: This version offers you a limited feature set and is free of charge. At any time, you can decide to upgrade to a “PRO” version from within the app.

“PRO (sponsored)”: This version offers you a full feature set and is free of charge. In return you agree that we collect network, system and usage parameters and results of connectivity tests and provide those for analysis within P3 group (companies affiliated with P3 Ingenieurgesellschaft mbH). In no case we collect personal data or compile transaction histories. 

“PRO”: This version offers you a full feature set and is available as an in-app purchase. Transaction costs apply as outlined during the app store payment process.

App functionalities

“Who’s Calling?” reads the name of the calling party for incoming phone calls or the sender’s name of a received message. Main features are:

• Supports phone, SMS, WhatsApp and custom apps (e.g. Facebook Messenger)
[with the “Light” version you can configure alerts for one app while the “PRO” versions allow you to configure it for an unlimited number of apps]
• Uses default TTS (Text-To-Speech) engine and language pack. Please ensure that “voice data” in TTS settings is installed
• Configurable format of spoken caller ID (first name, display name, ...)
• Certain contacts can be disabled or a custom name can be defined
• Speech volume can be configured relative to ring tone volume
• Test mode to simulate incoming calls and messages
• Mute speech by flipping the phone
• Configurable number of times it repeats the caller ID
• Possible to activate alerting only when connected to Bluetooth ® hands-free [only available in “PRO” versions]

The “PRO” versions are further free of ads.

Use of our app

You are not authorized to spread the app and its contents, logos or graphics in any other ways. Legal notices that appear in conjunction with our services, may in no way be removed, defaced or altered. We grant you in this regard, a non exclusive, non transferable right to use in this app. With cessation of service, the right to use ceases. You are not authorized to use the app beyond the permissions by this contract nor have third parties use it or otherwise make available to any third party. In particular, you are not permitted to copy the app or any part thereof or even decompile. 

You are free to recommend this app, so that others can install the app and use themselves. With use of our app you agree not to use it in an improper manner. This means that you may not modify or manipulate the app and its data. By using the app, you will not acquire any copyright or intellectual property rights in our services or the content, logos and graphics that you access, which means you cannot use them without our explicit consent. 

Costs

The “Light” and the “PRO (sponsored)” versions of the app are provided to you free of charge. The transmitted data may possibly incur costs or be deducted from your data allowance depending on your service contract. We try to keep this data volume as small as possible. The “PRO” version is available as an in-app purchase. Transaction costs apply as outlined during the app store payment process.

Liability

We do not warrant that transferred information is accurate and complete. We also are not liable should you incur damage from improper, incomplete or delayed transmission of information or a fault of the application. If the application or the transmission of data is leading to interference or damage to hardware or software, we are responsible only to the extent caused by intent or gross negligence by us. For your data loss we are not liable. Make sure before installation and thereafter at any time to cater for appropriate backup of the data stored on your device.

Although we always do our best to keep the app free of viruses, we do not guarantee that it is virus-free. Take care of your own protection and appropriate security measures to prevent viruses.

You are not entitled to a continuous and uninterrupted availability of the application. However, we are committed to achieving the highest possible availability and troubleshoot as quickly as possible. In addition, we have the right to temporarily or permanently discontinue our service, even without notice to you individually.

The liability for culpable injury to life, body or health, in accordance with the provisions of the Product Liability Act remains unaffected.

Our Service

We modify and improve our services continuously. We may, for example, add or remove functions or features or introduce new or additional restrictions on our services.

You may terminate your use of this app at any time by uninstalling, even though we would regret this. With the application being uninstalled the collection of information is stopped immediately (in case you are using the “PRO (sponsored)” version).

Declaration of Consent

By using the app you agree to these Terms of Use and the rules of the Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, you cannot use the app.

Privacy Policy – What we stand for

We, P3 insight GmbH, Am Kraftversorgungsturm 3, 52070 Aachen, Germany (P3) are aware that you consider a particularly safe handling of all your personal data as extremely important. We therefore guarantee you that all your data is processed in accordance with the provisions of the relevant German legislation, specifically the Telemedia Act (TMG), the Telecommunications Act (TKG) and the Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).

Principle

You always have the right to obtain information about the nature and extent of the stored data. For this purpose, please address your request to: ins.datenschutz@p3-group.com

You can always retrieve this Privacy Policy in the app. Once you have uninstalled the app, your data will be deleted from your device.

What information is collected

This app does not collect personal data. In NO case we collect content information such as messages or passwords.

In addition, the following only applies to use of the “PRO (sponsored)” version:

This version only collects so-called pseudonymous data. This is information that is not directly associated with the identity of the user, for example, the type of internet connection or the measured velocity and location.

In addition to the measured values from the connectivity test other localization information and technical (system) parameters are obtained. Some technical parameters (such as wireless network information) are collected periodically, e.g. subject to GPS localization events.

Specifically, the following data will be analyzed:

Measurement results from active connectivity test measurements

• Internet availability / success ratio 
• Download time 

Network, system and usage parameters

• User ID (pseudonymous random number)
• Wireless network information (e. g. network operator, cell ID, signal strength, SSID)
• Device information (e. g. model, operating system)
• Location information (e. g. longitude / latitude)
• Usage information (e. g. transferred amount of data, call logs)
• App information (e. g. installed apps, usage history)
• Time information (e. g. time stamps of the measurements)
• Other system information (e. g. battery status, memory usage)
• Release information (e. g. app build, data formats) 

The regular execution of the connectivity test and the collection of the network, system and usage information take place in the background.

If you wish to opt-out of this data collection, you have to de-install the “PRO (sponsored)” version and either re-install the “Light” or the “PRO” version.

Transfer and disclosure of information

This section only applies to use of the “PRO (sponsored)” version. 

The measured data from the app are stored in a database and used to for anonymous statistical analyses about the network quality. The information collected by your kind assistance supports the development and improvement of telecommunication networks. With acceptance of the Terms of Use, you agree that the information, as set forth in the Privacy Policy, is stored, transferred and may be used within P3 group.

Your data will only be forwarded to authorities exceptionally and only in cases established by law.

On request of a competent authority, we may, in individual cases only, disclose inventory data, insofar as this is necessary for law enforcement purposes, to fulfill the statutory duties of the Agency responsible for Internal Security (Verfassungsschutzbehörde), of the Federal Intelligence Service (BND) or the Military Counter-Intelligence Service (Militärischer Abschirmdienst) or for the enforcement of intellectual property rights. We hereby follow the statutory provision of § 14 paragraph 2 of the German Telemedia Act (TMG).

Right to Information

This section only applies to use of the “PRO (sponsored)” version. 

You always have the right to access, amend or block your stored data. To do so, please write to us. You can also contact our Privacy Officer at the e-mail address ins.datenschutz@p3-group.com.

Opt-out

This section only applies to use of the “PRO (sponsored)” version. 

You always have the option to uninstall the application. With the application being uninstalled the collection of information is stopped immediately.

Final Provisions

German law applies to the exclusion of the UN Sales Convention.

P3 reserves the right to update these Terms of Use.
